title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4100.2 - Power to supersede or suspend operation of the rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4100.2 - Power to supersede or suspend operation of the rules

State Regulations

The commission may, by written order or directive, supersede or suspend the operation of any of the commission's rules or
regulations when in the commission's judgment such action is necessary to
insure the public interest, convenience or necessity or the best interests of
racing generally. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4100.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
